content.about: I've been working with software engineering for over 6 years, currently I'm working in the core team at
content.about-experience: as a frontend and mobile developer. During all these years, I worked with different technologies, languages and frameworks. I was able to acquire experience to lead projects and carry out quality deliveries. I currently focus on software architecture, CI/CD, testing and monitoring. Work on training new developers in the team, share and acquire new knowledge.

current.about: Currently, contributing to improvements and deliveries on the
current.about-experience: , generating value for the end user. Integration with partner APIs and creation of development used by squads. Contributes for the
current.about-notification: library to ensure push notification on mobile application.

prev.about: My job was creating the new
prev.about-experience: , where users can interact with corporate info through their questions. I've built push notifications with Expo services. Also, I added deeplinks for easy access using a universal mechanism and app links. Implemented the Firebase dynamic links to facilitate the download app for the clients. Configured a version delivery workflow using development and Expo Release Channels.

last.about: My job involved reconstructing screens and creating new functionalities for the
last.about-experience: web system, catering to physical assessments and body measurement planning. I've streamlined the componentization process through atomic design concepts. Additionally, Participated in the development of a websocket communication feature between web and mobile using WebSocket API and Golang (Beego). Moreover, I took on the challenge of developing the mobile app Physical Test. It enables Bluetooth connectivity with a specific tool (adipometer) for accurate body measurement capture.
